 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיט‎</span>] **verb** ==scream, shriek== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***scream, scold***,<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***screaming, scolding***, [[BDB#Frey|Frey]] [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]<sup>ii. 195</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***anger, reviling***); — only **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫עַט בָּהֶם‎</span> [[1Sam.25.14|1Sam 25:14]] ***and he screamed at them*** (of Nabal). 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיט‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==dart greedily== (like a bird of prey); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּ֫עַט‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]]:erroneous <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויעשׂ‎</span>) [[1Sam.14.32|1Sam 14:32]] ***and*** the people ***darted greedily*** upon the spoil (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלהַֿשָּׁלָל‎</span>, so 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּ֫עַט‎</span> [[1Sam.15.19|1Sam 15:19]] (on forms see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72»§ 72</sup> f f.).
